page.title: 13LUDFORD _ OTHER BUSINESSES
page.content: The Boucherette Cafe, named after the once main landowners in district, is at the crossroads of A631 & Horncastle to Caistor Road and has attractive tea rooms and collects 101 Squadron RAF memorabilia. There is a Father & Son Car Repair and Agricultural Engineering business, the son having participated in Car Racing. A Schoolmaster turned Wood Turner makes wooden goods, toys &c and exhibits and sells at Craft Fairs. Another Woodyard makes Fence Posts,Pit Props for Mines & Overlap Fencing. 6 Builders of various kinds in Village A Roofing Contractor who also does Combined Harvesting in season. Car Repair workshop specialising in French Citroen Cars. Bulk Carrier Lorry Haulage Contractor who moves Grain, other Farming Produce Gravel and other bulk loads.
